Note:  
 
In terms of Code 1.3 of the Stewardship Code of the Company, the Stewardship 
Principles shall be acted upon in respect of those investee companies in which the 
Company’s investment is in excess of 1% of the Investment Assets of the Company as 
at the end of the immediately preceding quarter.
